Character

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • Character.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Kikiam, Wizard

    public abstract class Character
extends java.lang.Object
    The Character class models a character for a roleplaying game. A character has a name and 3 stats: strength, dexterity, and intelligence, as well as maximum allowed life points and the current value.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Character(java.lang.String n, int s, int d, int i)
      Constructor takes 4 parameters: n,s,d,i and assigns them to instance variables name, strength, dexterity, intelligence.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String n,
         int s,
         int d,
         int i)
        Constructor takes 4 parameters: n,s,d,i and assigns them to instance variables name, strength, dexterity, intelligence. Also uses the dice instance to assign a random number to maxlife. currentlife is initialized to maxlife
        Parameters:
        n - name
        s - strength
        d - dexterity
        i - intelligence

        public void wound(int damage)
        Decreases currentlife by the damage parameter
        Parameters:
        damage - damage

      • heal

        public void heal(int heal)
        Increases currentlife by the heal parameter. currentlife cannot be greater than maxlife
        Parameters:
        heal - heal
